body_html:
Objective

To inference my trained model in Windows using executable program without python, so I try to build tf follow cmake instructions.

Enviroment

Have I written custom code
No
OS Platform and Distribution
Win10 Pro, VS2015
TensorFlow installed from
Source code
TensorFlow version
Git pull tf yesterday(08, Aug) and use master branch
Bazel version
Using cmake 3.10
CUDA/cuDNN version
Do not use GPU, tensorflow_GPU_ENABLE=OFF, but my PC has CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7
GPU model and memory
N/A
Other cmake options
tensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS = OFF
tensorflow_BUILD_ALL_KERNELS = ON
tensorflow_BUILD_CC_EXAMPLE = ON
tensorflow_ENABLE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE = ON
tensorflow_ENABLE_SNAPPY_SUPPORT = ON

Problem:

Build failed with gRPC supported

Git clone grpc/third_party/libFuzzer failed
Cloning into 'third_party/libFuzzer'...
fatal: unable to access 'https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/llvm-project/llvm/lib/Fuzzer/': Failed to connect to chromium.googlesource.com port 443: Timed out

Build failed without gRPC supported

tensorflow_ENABLE_GRPC_SUPPORT = OFF, but compile failed bcz cannot find "grpc++“ header file, why still need grpc related file?
Error C1083 Cannot open include file: 'grpc++/grpc++.h': No such file or directory (compiling source file D:\Workspace\Github\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\eager\context.cc) tf_core_cpu D:\Workspace\Github\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\distributed_runtime\rpc\grpc_server_lib.h 21

body:
## Objective
To inference my trained model in Windows using executable program without python, so I try to build tf follow [cmake](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md) instructions.
## Enviroment
Have I written custom code
**No**
OS Platform and Distribution
**Win10 Pro, VS2015**
TensorFlow installed from
**Source code**
TensorFlow version
**Git pull tf yesterday(08, Aug) and use master branch**
Bazel version
**Using cmake 3.10**
CUDA/cuDNN version
**Do not use GPU, tensorflow_GPU_ENABLE=OFF, but my PC has CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7**
GPU model and memory
**N/A**
Other cmake options
tensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS = OFF
tensorflow_BUILD_ALL_KERNELS = ON
tensorflow_BUILD_CC_EXAMPLE = ON
tensorflow_ENABLE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE = ON
tensorflow_ENABLE_SNAPPY_SUPPORT = ON
## Problem: 
### Build failed with gRPC supported
**Git clone grpc/third_party/libFuzzer failed**
Cloning into 'third_party/libFuzzer'...
fatal: unable to access 'https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/llvm-project/llvm/lib/Fuzzer/': Failed to connect to chromium.googlesource.com port 443: Timed out
### Build failed without gRPC supported
**tensorflow_ENABLE_GRPC_SUPPORT = OFF,  but compile failed bcz cannot find "grpc++“ header file, why still need grpc related file?**
Error	C1083	Cannot open include file: 'grpc++/grpc++.h': No such file or directory (compiling source file D:\Workspace\Github\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\eager\context.cc)	tf_core_cpu	D:\Workspace\Github\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\distributed_runtime\rpc\grpc_server_lib.h	21
